name: Revengers Vs Invaders | Plants Vs Zombie -Multiplayer (MOD)
name_original: Revengers Vs Invaders | Plants Vs Zombie -Multiplayer (MOD)
description:
Before you Hit the DOWNLOAD Button, please read the basic strategy guide to play Multiplayer Mode. 👇                           For Defender                               For AttackerDefender got 10 lives.   i.e   if 10 attacker crosses the border line than  defender lose the game.
Invader got limited no. of attackers, if got run out of all the attackers than Invader lose the game. (Playing with attacker is a bit tougher so let your big bro play this side)
Plant atleast 20 yellow sunflower as soon as possible.
(Tips:  you can also use this flower to block attacker's incoming Bomb)
Plant red Flowers as soon as possible.
( Tips :If you run out of  your Stars (i.e money to spawn Attackers) you can WAIT a bit longer to gather a large amount of money and then spawn even more of your attackers.
Use this   Wall to block large no. of Attackers fleet.
Use This Bomb to Destroy Defender's wall in a second.  (This deals low damage against other defender)
Use this  Bomb to Destroy any number of Attackers in a specific area.  (This bomb does  gets destroyed by Attacker's Bomb if both are triggered at the same place, use your flowers to stop incoming Attacker's Bomb.)                                                            
Use This  to Destroy Defender Bomb  before it even explodes.  (For this to work, you need to spawn this bomb continuously in the lane where you spawned too many of your attackers) 
Use this Shovel to remove any defender you want.
(  Tips:  If   this guy👉👉
is crossing over your defender, use this shovel to remove that defender and use bomb in that area to destroy this guy👉
                                                                         
This guy  have the most health of all attackers and can pass through  anything including Defender Wall, but walking speed is very low.
(Also this guy needs two defender bomb to get killed)
This Defender have high damage power.
(Can kill the fox in two hit)
This Fox  runs very fast, have high attacking power, can jump over the defender wall but have low health.To not get defeated by this move👉
of Attacker use your bomb as fast  you can.
If you feel all the lanes of are pretty heavily garded and the defender also use bomb all the time to  destroy all your attackers in an instance, then fear not, you can wait for sometime till your resources get high (about 3000) and USE your THREE FINGERS simultaneously to spawn attackers in multiple lanes.

Converted the Glitch Garden game into multiplayer (Thanks to GameDev.tv for the asset pack)
